name: Soul Fighter (itch)
description:
HalfSpinMuon presents

The robots have taken the souls of humans and fled to space, geared with their own soul-stealing technology that lets you take them down, you have been sent to retrieve the souls and bring them back to Earth. But beware! Using it will harm you as much as it harms them, and... try not to lose them into the void, or, die.

Get to the final portal that awaits your sacrifices, and kill those in your way.

This is a small 3D First-Person shooter, where you are as much a threat to yourself as the enemies.

Made for: mini jam 110

Jam Theme: Sacrifice

Limitation: Failure is Inevitable

Controls:

Movementstandard WASDSprintleft shiftJumpspaceLookmouseShootleft clickSwitch weaponstab

Missed a day and a half for the 3 day game jam, so it's not exactly what I wanted it to be, but I've tried my best to take it to this point, so please enjoy :D! (there's probably a lot of bugs)

(Unfortunately, I have only tested MacOS and WebGL builds, so idk if the Windows version will work)
